content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest, Ms. Smith. I am sure you will find the apartment quite comfortable. Now, let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Well, considering the size of the apartment and the location, I would say a fair price would be around 600 Euros per month.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I'm sorry, but that is below my expected price range. How about 750 Euros per month? This would be a very competitive price for the area.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 750 Euros per month is quite high for an apartment of this size, especially considering the utilities. I would prefer to pay around 650 Euros per month, which I think is a more reasonable price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I appreciate your counter-offer, but 650 Euros per month is still below my asking price. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at 700 Euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Heinrich Heine
